title: Do Ranked wins still count even tho the Leagues system is down?
body: sorry i didnt know where to post this, but my freind and i played a ranked this morning before noticing that the Leagues system is down,so will that game still give us LP or no?

replies.body: Everything with ranked matches should still count!  The only issue right now is a visual display with the profile page.  Everything else is in working order.  We'll be keeping updates on the current maintenance through the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Hope that helps clear things up!
I just won three in a a row and that should put me into a series. So if I win 2/3 will I still get promoted?
There's are currently no issues with ranked matches, and everything will continue to play out as normal.  If you get into a series and win, you will receive your promotion.  Good luck!
